alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 9:49AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHEMUNG...TIOGA...AND BROOME COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a half mile. A quick half inch of snow could fall and this will cause slippery travel conditions. Use caution and plan some extra time to reach your destination this morning. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 946 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Nanticoke to near Millport and moving east at 20 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Binghamton, Johnson City, Endicott, Maine, Owego, Erin, Nanticoke, Port Dickinson, Newark Valley, and Candor. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 4 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 near 64, and between 69 and 72. Interstate 88 between 1 and 5. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
